name: Dive of Cells
description:
Destroy all pathogens together with plasma cells and antibodies!

GitHub: https://github.com/HK-SHAO/G-bits-GameJam-2022

Keywords

- Cellular Automata (CA)

- Conway's Game of Life (GOL)

- Cell division and virus proliferation

- Pushing the Box

How to play: Use plasma cells and antibodies to remove all viruses and bacteria!

Game Mechanics

- Cell division: Click on a cell to divide a new cell

Cell state legend

- Changes its state according to the number of cells around it

- The cell is afraid of solitude, it will hang when it is alone

- The cell hates crowding, when there are too many cells around it, the cell also hangs

Cells attract each other

- Cells like to adhere to other cells

- Cells will spontaneously cluster together

Virus proliferates

- Viruses choose how much to proliferate depending on the state of the cell

Bacteria destroy cells directly

Plasma cells release antibodies that effectively destroy viruses and bacteria
